casepack.title: Confinement as Integrity Collapse — Theorem T3 (19/19 Sub-Tests)
casepack.description: Complete reproducibility bundle for the confinement paper. Contains PDG-2024 raw particle data (17 fundamental + 14 composite), 8-channel trace vectors, kernel invariant computation, guard band robustness analysis, and exotic hadron verification. All frozen parameters sourced from SM.INTSTACK.v1.yaml. One-command rerun: python run_confinement_T3.py

run_intent.notes: Entrypoint: python run_confinement_T3.py — Computes 8-channel kernel invariants for 31 SM particles, verifies Theorem T3 (19/19 sub-tests: universal suppression IC_h < IC_q^min, 98.1% collapse, 10.8x gap amplification, baryon/meson ordering, F non-annihilation), guard band robustness across eps in [1e-12, 1e-2], and exotic hadron predictions (6/6 LHCb-confirmed). All frozen parameters from SM.INTSTACK.v1.yaml.
